product_name: REI Tech-Compatible Thermo Gloves - Men's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: With conductive leather fingertips, the REI Tech-Compatible Thermo gloves let you use your touch-screen gadgets without exposing your hands to the cold. Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) polyester fleece blocks wind up to 8 mph and continues to insulate when damp; fabric is water repellent to shed light snow. Conductive leather palm patches extend up thumbs and index fingers to allow you to operate your touch-screen phone without taking the gloves off. Grippy leather palms give you a good hold on your smartphone or other equipment; non-bulky fingers preserve dexterity. REI Tech-Compatible Thermo gloves are sized to fit men's hands. Overstock.
